name: Tactical M1911
thoughts: A pistol with Coolheaded is always good to have. Buy it if you don't have one already.

name: Pakhan
thoughts: If you can unlock Determined, re-roll Unforgiving for Destructive.

name: Tactical SASG-12 K
thoughts: Good damage roll. I'd re-roll Dominant for Responsive.

name: MG5
thoughts: Not the best combo and the damage roll is average. If you don't have the blueprint, buy one and re-roll Accurate for Destructive. If you can't unlock Determined, I wouldn't buy it.

name: LVOA-C
thoughts: Must buy. Nice damage roll and Determined is in the free slot. I'd re-roll Dominant for Destructive. Other options are Predatory, Ferocious and Competent depending on your build.

name: Ti-RANT Suppressor
thoughts: Good rolls even if they are not max. Specially good for SMGs.

name: Extended Magazine
thoughts: If you don't have better magazines, this one has great size and CHD but it's missing CHC or RoF.

name: VX-1 scope (12x)
thoughts: Perfect attribute combo for this mod. HSD is not max but it's a must buy if you don't have better ones.

name: Vertical Grip
thoughts: Good grip to use with shotguns.

name: Omega Rifle Suppressor - Tan
thoughts: Not perfect but HSD and CHD are a must on this kind of suppressor.

name: Inventive Backpack
thoughts: Great armor, low electronics. Good for Skill Power builds. I'd max out the main stat.

name: Nimble Holster
thoughts: Low armor but it can be optimized. The main stats are almost maxed.

name: Electronics Mod
thoughts: Almost electronics with max skill haste. Buy a set of 5 if you don't have better ones.

name: Electronics Mod
thoughts: Low ELE but it has 3% Damage to Elites. Great for most PvE builds.

name: Stamina Mod
thoughts: Almost max Stamina for a Superior mod with 3% Damage to Elites. Buy a set of 5 if you don't have one with 4%.
